#include<cstdio>
//#include <time.h>
#include<iostream>
#define MIN(a,b) a<=b?a:b
using namespace std;
long scan()
{
long t=0;
char c;
c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c<'0' || c>'9')
c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c>='0' && c<='9')
{
t=(t<<3)+(t<<1)+c-'0';
c=getchar_unlocked();
}
return(t);
}
int min(int x,int y,int z)
{
    if(x<=y&&x<=z)
    return x;
    if(y<=x&&y<=z)
    return y;
    if(z<=x&&z<=y)
    return z;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    t=scan();
    while(t--)
    {
        int cap,men,women,child,maxm,maxw,maxc,reqm=0,reqw=0,reqc=0,flag=1,swomen=0,temp;
       cap=scan();
       men=scan();
       women=scan();
       child=scan();
       // scanf("%d %d %d %d",&cap,&men,&women,&child);
 //       clock_t start = clock();
        maxm=men;
        maxw=MIN((2*maxm),women);
        maxc=MIN((4*(maxm+maxw)),child);
        if(cap>=(maxm+maxw+maxc))
        {
            reqm=maxm;
            reqw=maxw;
            reqc=maxc;
            flag=0;
        }
        if(flag)
        {
            while(cap>=15&&men>=1&&women>=2&&child>=12)
            {
                cap-=15;
                men-=1;
                women-=2;
                child-=12;
                reqm+=1;
                reqw+=2;
                reqc+=12;
            }
  //          printf("%d %d %d %d\n",cap,men,women,child);
            while(cap>1&&child>0&&(men>0||women>0))
            {
               // printf("1\n");
                temp=min(child,4,cap-1);
                reqc+=temp;
                cap-=temp;
                child-=temp;

                if(women>0&&cap>1)
                {
                  //  if(swomen==0)
                  if(reqw==reqm*2&&men>0)
                    {
                        cap-=1;
                        reqm+=1;
                        men-=1;
                        temp=min(child,4,cap-1);
                        reqc+=temp;
                        cap-=temp;
                        child-=temp;

                    }
               //     if(cap>0)
               if(reqw<(2*reqm)&&women>0)
                    {
                    cap-=1;
                    reqw+=1;
                   // swomen+=1;
                    women-=1;
                    //if(swomen==2)
                    //swomen=0;
                    }

                }
                else if(women>0&&cap>0&&reqw<(2*reqm))
                    {
                    cap-=1;
                    reqw+=1;
                   // swomen+=1;
                    women-=1;
                    }
                else if(men>0&&cap>0)
                {
                    cap-=1;
                    reqm+=1;
                    men-=1;
                }
    //           printf("This one %d %d %d %d\n",cap,men,women,child);

            }
      //     printf("%d %d %d %d\n",cap,men,women,child);

            swomen=0;
            while(cap>0&&women>0&&men>0)
            {
        //       printf("2\n");

               // if(swomen==0)
                if(reqw==reqm*2&&cap>1)
                    {
                        cap-=1;
                        reqm+=1;
                        men-=1;
          //              printf("%d %d %d %d\n",cap,men,women,child);

                    }
                if(reqw<(2*reqm))
                    {
                    cap-=1;
                    reqw+=1;
                 //   swomen+=1;
                    women-=1;
                 //   if(swomen==2)
                 //   swomen=0;
            //        printf("%d %d %d %d\n",cap,men,women,child);

                    }
                    else
                    {
              //      printf("else %d %d %d\n",reqm,reqw,cap);
                    break;
                    }
            }
     //       printf("%d %d %d %d\n",cap,men,women,child);

                while(cap>0&&reqw<(2*reqm)&&women>0)
                {
                    cap-=1;
                    reqw+=1;
                 //   swomen+=1;
                    women-=1;
                }
            if(cap>0&&men>0)
            {
            //    printf("3");
                temp=MIN(cap,men);
                reqm+=temp;
                cap-=temp;
                men-=temp;
            }
       //     printf("%d %d %d %d\n",cap,men,women,child);


        }
        printf("%d %d %d\n",reqm,reqw,reqc);
        //printf("Time elapsed: %f\n", ((double)clock() - start) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
    }
    return 0;
}
/*
Input:
3
17 5 10 19
18 2 6 10
20 5 2 23

Output:
2 2 13
2 4 10
2 2 16
*/
